entry.title: Apple’s tiny M4 Mac Mini has dropped to its lowest price yet
entry.content: Apple’s latest Mac Mini desktop is on sale for up to $150 off right now. The Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 and Marshall’s Emberton III speaker are also discounted.

entry.title: Adobe launches a new ‘computational photography’ camera app for iPhones
entry.content: Adobe Labs has launched Project Indigo, a new computational photography camera app for iPhones. Former Google engineer Marc Levoy helped make it.
entry.summary: Adobe Labs has launched Project Indigo, a new computational photography camera app for iPhones. Former Google engineer Marc Levoy helped make it.

entry.title: Microsoft is blocking Google Chrome through its family safety feature
entry.content: Microsoft’s parental controls have started blocking Google’s Chrome browser. The issue started in early June, and stops Chrome from opening properly.

entry.title: Meta announces Oakley smart glasses
entry.content: Meta is releasing a new line of AI glasses with Oakley, starting with a $499 limited-edition gold accent frame that shoots 3K video.
